senselogic.sitevision.api.bookmark

Interface BookmarkUtil


  • @Requireable(value="BookmarkUtil")
public interface BookmarkUtil

    Bookmark utility interface. Bookmarks are potentially clustered between sitevision instances. All altering methods in this class are synchronized.

    Note: Does NOT work for anonymous users!

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getBookmarkUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 2.6.1
    Author:
    Mikael Wikblom

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Node bookmark)
      Adds a bookmark for the current user.
      void add(Node bookmark, String categories)
      Deprecated. 
      Use add(javax.jcr.Node), categories will be resolved from metadata.
      boolean contains(Node bookmark)
      Checks if the current user has the provided bookmark
      List<Node> getBookmarks()
      Returns a list of Node objects for all bookmarks belonging to the current user regardless of category.
      List<Node> getBookmarks(String category)
      Returns a list of Node objects corresponding to the bookmarks for the current user and the provided categories.
      boolean getLimitNofBookmarks()
      Accesses a boolean indicating if the current site has a limited number of bookmarks.
      int getMaxNofBookmarks()
      Accessor to max number of bookmarks for the current site.
      void remove(Node bookmark)
      Removes a bookmark for the current user.

    • Method Detail

      • getBookmarks

        List<Node> getBookmarks()
        Returns a list of Node objects for all bookmarks belonging to the current user regardless of category. This method only returns valid bookmarks (existing, published objects)
        Returns:
        a list of bookmark nodes. Is never null

      • getBookmarks

        List<Node> getBookmarks(String category)
        Returns a list of Node objects corresponding to the bookmarks for the current user and the provided categories. This method only returns valid bookmarks (existing, published objects)
        Parameters:
        category - a comma separated list of categories or null for no category
        Returns:
        a list of bookmark nodes. Is never null

      • add

        @Deprecated
void add(Node bookmark,
                     String categories)
        Deprecated. Use add(javax.jcr.Node), categories will be resolved from metadata.
        Adds a bookmark for the current user. This operation is synchronized
        Parameters:
        bookmark - the node to be bookmarked must be a sv:page, sv:sitePage or an sv:article
        categories - a comma separated list of categories to where this bookmark belongs
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if bookmark is node of wrong type
        NullPointerException - if bookmark is null

      • add

        void add(Node bookmark)
        Adds a bookmark for the current user. This operation is synchronized
        Parameters:
        bookmark - the node to be bookmarked must be a sv:page, sv:sitePage or an sv:article
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if bookmark is node of wrong type
        NullPointerException - if bookmark is null

      • remove

        void remove(Node bookmark)
        Removes a bookmark for the current user. This operation is synchronized
        Parameters:
        bookmark - the bookmark
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if bookmark is null

      • contains

        boolean contains(Node bookmark)
        Checks if the current user has the provided bookmark
        Parameters:
        bookmark - the bookmark
        Returns:
        if the user has provided bookmark
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if bookmark is null

      • getLimitNofBookmarks

        boolean getLimitNofBookmarks()
        Accesses a boolean indicating if the current site has a limited number of bookmarks. To get the max number of bookmarks, use getMaxNofBookmarks().
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the current site has a limited number of bookmarks
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if current site is indeterminable
        Since:
        Sitevision 2.6.1_01
        See Also:
        getMaxNofBookmarks()

      • getMaxNofBookmarks

        int getMaxNofBookmarks()
        Accessor to max number of bookmarks for the current site.
        Returns:
        max number of bookmarks for the current site
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if current site is indeterminable
        Since:
        Sitevision 2.6.1_01
        See Also:
        getLimitNofBookmarks()

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
